stimulusHtml: Using the intelligence quotient formula to determine IQ, which of the following individuals would have the highest IQ?
choicesHtml: Sam, who has a mental age of 5 and a chronological age of 5
Dianne, who has a mental age of 5 and a chronological age of 6
Woody, who has a mental age of 6 and a chronological age of 5
Carla, who has a mental age of 7 and a chronological age of 5
